meanings.definition: To place in a line or arrange in a line.
meanings.sent1: She alines the books neatly on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: Please alines the chairs in a straight row.
meanings.sent3: The teacher asked the students to alines their pencils like soldiers.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts alines perfectly with her actions.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully alines the colors on the canvas to create a beautiful painting.

meanings.definition: To adjust or position in relation to something else.
meanings.sent1: He alines the picture frame with the edge of the table.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic alines the wheels of the car for better performance.
meanings.sent3: The chef alines the ingredients on the cutting board before starting to cook.
meanings.sent4: The stars alines in the night sky, creating a stunning view.
meanings.sent5: She alines her goals with her values to stay focused and motivated.

meanings.definition: To bring into alignment or agreement.
meanings.sent1: The team alines their strategies for the upcoming project.
meanings.sent2: The therapist helps the couple alines their perspectives on communication.
meanings.sent3: The siblings alines their stories to convince their parents of the truth.
meanings.sent4: His actions alines with his words, showing his integrity.
meanings.sent5: The music alines perfectly with the choreography, creating a mesmerizing performance.
